column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Sara - Thank you for the 5-star review. We greatly appreciate it. I'm glad you enjoyed our fare. We do separate our broth from noodles for the very reason you describe. Also
column2: if you heat up the broth separately
column3: it recreates the ramen meal much better than heating everything simultaneously. Thank you again
column4: and we hope to serve you in the future.
